author: markrmiller
msg: SOLR-6002: Fix a couple of ugly issues around SolrIndexWriter close and rollback as well as how SolrIndexWriter manages it's ref counted directory instance.

author: markt
msg: Tomcat 8 uses Java 7 where RFC 5746 is supported in all versions so remove unused/unnecessary code.
